sentences.en: EM, like resistivity, can also give structural information: faults, shear or altered conductive areas.

sentences.en: In addition to good water conductivity , Polypropylene fabric is also moisture conductive.

sentences.en: Prolonged therapy should be avoided since it is conductive to toxic reactions.
